featured.text: Almost everything, from food to machinery, comes by way of the sea in huge ships piloted by captains.

definition.zh_def: 船隻；一種用於水上運輸的交通工具。
definition.en_def: A large vessel for transporting people or goods by sea.
definition.example: The ship sailed across the ocean to deliver supplies.
